name: AuroraBound Deluxe
description: AuroraBound Deluxe is a relaxing and addictive puzzle game, where you link matching pieces together to discover beautiful hidden patterns.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1 GHz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card with 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
